name: JawDropping
description:
A short puzzle platform made for the 2022 Game Dev TV Game Jam.

Upon death you will drop your head and teleport back to it once needed. Use your head to solve the puzzles by leading enemies around the map.

Download for Windows for a better experience.

Controls:

A-D: Left-Right

Space: Jump

Q: Teleport

E: Interact

R: Restart Level
